text: 250 (CCL) was . == Events == *Diophantus writes Arithmetica the first systematic treatise on algebra. *A group of Franks penetrate as far as Tarragona in Spain (approximate date). *Goths invade Moesia. *The Alamanni drive the Romans from the modern area of Donau-Ries. *Decius begins a period of persecution of the Christians in the Roman Empire. *Teotihuacán is rebuilt as a four-quartered cosmogram by Zapotec architects brought from Monte Albán in Oaxaca. *Kofun Period begins in Japan. == Births == * Helena of Constantinople * Licinius
